statements.statement: WITH temp AS ( SELECT p.ProductNo, p.ProductModel AS GoodsNo, ProductName, pe.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile, p.BrandNo, b.BrandCnName, b.BrandEnName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY p.ProductNO ) AS row FROM SpProduct AS p ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfProductExtend AS pe ( NOLOCK ) ON pe.ProductNo = p.ProductNo INNER JOIN (SELECT ProductNo FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend skue ( NOLOCK ) WHERE skue.PcSaleState=2 GROUP BY ProductNo) AS t ON t.ProductNo=p.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS b ( NOLOCK ) ON p.BrandNo = b.BrandNo WHERE 1=1 and pe.ProductShowPic <> '' AND pe.TypeFlag = 1 #if($Keyword!='') AND (p.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' OR p.ProductNo =@KeyWord OR p.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and p.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and p.ProductType=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and b.BrandNo=@BrandNO #end #if($StartDateShelf!='') and b.PcShelfDate > @StartDateShelf #end #if($EndDateShelf!='') and b.PcShelfDate < @EndDateShelf #end ) SELECT * FROM temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

select count(0) FROM SpProduct AS p ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfProductExtend AS pe ( NOLOCK ) ON pe.ProductNo = p.ProductNo INNER JOIN (SELECT ProductNo FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend skue ( NOLOCK ) WHERE skue.PcSaleState=2 GROUP BY ProductNo) AS t ON t.ProductNo=p.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS b ( NOLOCK ) ON p.BrandNo = b.BrandNo WHERE 1=1 and pe.ProductShowPic <> '' AND pe.TypeFlag = 1 #if($Keyword!='') AND (p.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' OR p.ProductNo =@KeyWord OR p.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and p.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and p.ProductType=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and b.BrandNo=@BrandNO #end #if($StartDateShelf!='') and b.PcShelfDate > @StartDateShelf #end #if($EndDateShelf!='') and b.PcShelfDate < @EndDateShelf #end
update SWfsGlobalConfig set ConfigValue=@ConfigValue where FunctionNo='IndexNewArrival'
